translated: Lucan (Marcus Annaeus Lucanus) is a Latin poet of the first century, born November 3, 39 in Cordoba (Spain) and died 30 April 65, at the age of 25 years.
original: Lucain (Marcus Annaeus Lucanus) est un poète latin du Ier siècle, né le 3 novembre 39 à Cordoue (Espagne) et mort le 30 avril 65, à l'âge de 25 ans.
